newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Telekom denies TV3 stake talks.
newsitem.headline: Telekom denies TV3 stake talks.

text.p: Telekom Malaysia Bhd has denied a newspaper report that it was eyeing a 20 percent stake in Malaysian private television broadcaster Sistem Televisyen Malaysia Bhd (TV3).

"There has been no negotiations between TM (Telekom Malaysia) and TV3 on the matter and there were no offers or commitments made by either parties," Telekom said in a statement issued to the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange.
It added that the report in The Star newspaper on October 29 was "mere market speculation".
"In the circumstances TM is unable to make any announcement as requested by the Exchange," the statement said.
Telekom had been given two weeks by the Stock Exchange to clarify the news report.
